hero.heading: Super charge your social app with video
hero.description: Livepeer brings together everything you need to create, deliver, and scale live, on-demand, and realtime video without worrying about surprise costs or vendor lock-in. Organizations like Lens, Minds, and Orb use Livepeer to build custom video solutions.

why.title: Features
why.heading: A complete video solution for the future of social
why.description: Whether going live, sharing a duet, or hosting a video call with friends, social creators expect video to "just work". With Livepeer, integrating fast, performant video has never been easier.

caseStudy.heading: Rad Radio, in partnership with Lens, use Livepeer to build live music streaming social app
caseStudy.about: Rad Radio is a live music streaming app where listeners can seamlessly tune in and share their listening experiences on Lens, a decentralized social protocol.
caseStudy.problem: Rad Radio wanted a way to leverage the power of open video and open social to help musicians engage their global audiences unable to attend in person.
caseStudy.solution: By leveraging Livepeer, Rad Radio was able build a platform where musicians could broadcast events globally and drive significantly more engagement.

testimonial.name: Christina Beltramini
testimonial.quote: Livepeer's decentralized video infrastructure provides powerful and reliable livestreaming technology for social applications looking to build live or on-demand video experiences.
